seo.title: Manarola Apartments 2025 | Vacation Rentals with Kitchen
seo.description: Rent an apartment in Manarola. Self-catering vacation rentals with kitchens, terraces, and authentic village living.

body.title: Vacation Apartments
body.subtitle: Live like a local in your own apartment. Full kitchens, private terraces, and the freedom to explore on your own schedule.

features.title: Casa Capellini
features.description: Traditional apartment with sea-view terrace. Kitchen, 2 bedrooms, sleeps 4-5.

features.title: Manarola Holidays
features.description: Modern renovated apartments in the heart of the village. Various sizes available.

features.title: La Torretta Apartments
features.description: Historic building apartments with character. Some with balconies overlooking the harbor.

features.title: Vista Mare
features.description: Stunning sea views from every window. Rooftop terrace for sunset watching.

features.title: Kitchen-Equipped Studios
features.description: Compact studios perfect for couples. Full kitchen and cozy living space.

features.title: Family Apartments
features.description: Spacious 3-bedroom apartments. Perfect for families or groups up to 6 people.
